Text:
Many thanks for your generous uploads over the years.  You are one of my favourite uploaders.

All the best for the new year for both yourself and your family.

Why, thanks! That's one of the nicest things I've ever heard here. My best to you and yours as well.

BTW - some other good stuff is on the way today.
thank you rambam. how many volumes are there to this autobiography? happy new year.

There are to be three volumes, but the others have not yet been released.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Autobiography_of_Mark_Twain
It's wonderful to have this, many thanks for sharing with us, and happy new year to you and yours ...

rambam, we could be waiting a long time for volumes 2 and 3. this was posted on the link you said in your last comment. As documented in the first volume, Twain indicated that his wish was for the second volume to be published 25 years after the first, in 2035, and the third and final volume to be published 25 years after that, in 2060.
Many thanks rambam !! I'm gonna check back here  in 2035 for vol 2 !! :)
